"Even entertainment that is 'mindless' need not lack quality, or wit, or a passion forâ€¦well, for anything, in the way that 'Margaritaville' does...When such a show takes up one of the few available Broadway theatres, those of us who love Broadway musicals get a bit grumpy...Not that everything in this show is bad.
